resources.string: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.
Meshify is now running in the background
Meshify gives you the power to connect with others without internet.
Verify your phone number to see the full potential of Meshify.
Report technical issues or suggest new features
Select your preferred mesh forwarding profile
By registering your account, you accept our Terms and Conditions.
Verifying your phone number allows you to contact friend via SMS
M E S H I F Y

resources.string: You\'ve already used %1$s. You can connect your %2$s account with %1$s by signing in with email link below.\n\nFor this flow to successfully connect your %2$s account with this email, you have to open the link on the same device or browser.

resources.string: By tapping “%1$s”, an SMS may be sent. Message & data rates may apply.

string.name: fui_sms_terms_of_service_and_privacy_policy_extended
string.translation_description: Fine print warning displayed below Verify Phone Number button

resources.string: By tapping “%1$s”, you are indicating that you accept our %2$s and %3$s. An SMS may be sent. Message & data rates may apply.
Meshify requires an active internet connection in the first time it is used.
